code: import React from"react";const Note=props=>{const updateTitle=e=>{const updatedValue=e.target.value;const editMeId=props.note.id;props.onType(editMeId,"title",updatedValue);};const updateDescription=e=>{const updatedValue=e.target.value;const editMeId=props.note.id;props.onType(editMeId,"description",updatedValue);};const clickDelete=()=>props.removeNote(props.note.id);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"note"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",value:props.note.title,onChange:updateTitle,placeholder:"Title",className:"note__title"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{value:props.note.description,onChange:updateDescription,placeholder:"Description...",className:"note__description"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"note__delete",onClick:clickDelete},"X"));};export default Note;
